Greenville.French Bilingual School of South Carolin: The French Bilingual School of South Carolina (French: École Française Bilingue - South Carolina, EFB) is an overseas French school in Wade Hampton in unincorporated Greenville County, South Carolina, in the Greenville-Spartanburg area. The school serves Kindergarten through the 12th grade and uses the curriculum of the French Ministry of Education. The elementary section includes grades K4-5, the middle section includes grades 6-9, and the high school section is 10-12.
